name: Omnifate (itch)
description:
Omnifate is a one screen 2D platformer in development, in Unity, for PC, with console and mobile ports planned. 

Features:

Pixel art

An original soundtrack

Some puzzle levels

And more planned!

you can find full length song uploads at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnoHgnivHM5HVPtdaaGjCiw
